Title.evidence: A Randomised Controlled Trial of a Flipped Classroom Model in Nursing Education

Trial_Design.evidence: A total of 228 participants were randomised

Intervention.evidence: control group receiving traditional instruction and an experimental group engaged in a digitally enhanced preparatory phase

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates the impact of a digitally enhanced flipped classroom model

Method_Outcome.evidence: A 25-item self-report questionnaire measured perceived competence

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation was conducted using a computer-generated sequence, and allocation was concealed using sealed envelopes

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 228 participants were randomised

Result_Outcome.evidence: Statistical analysis using Welchâ€™s t-test revealed significant improvements in the experimental group across all domains (p < 0.001)
